name: STEINS;GATE: Linear Bounded Phenogram
detailed_description:
A story for every lab member. Discover a new side of each STEINS;GATE character and get a glimpse of their inner thoughts through 10 new stories.

While STEINS;GATE unfolded from the perspective of the protagonist, Okabe Rintaro, STEINS;GATE: Linear Bounded Phenogram features stories told by the rest of the main cast.

  • STEINS;GATE: Linear Bounded Phenogram is available only with purchase of STEINS;GATE ELITE
about_the_game:
A story for every lab member. Discover a new side of each STEINS;GATE character and get a glimpse of their inner thoughts through 10 new stories.

While STEINS;GATE unfolded from the perspective of the protagonist, Okabe Rintaro, STEINS;GATE: Linear Bounded Phenogram features stories told by the rest of the main cast.

  • STEINS;GATE: Linear Bounded Phenogram is available only with purchase of STEINS;GATE ELITE
short_description: A story for every lab member. Discover a new side of each STEINS;GATE character and get a glimpse of their inner thoughts through 10 new stories.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Core i3 of Sandy Bridge generation or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Series (It needs 1GB memory allocation)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Devices compartible Direct Sound
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720 or better required (Recommended 1920x1080)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows7/8.1/10 (64bit ver)
  • Processor: Core i5 of Ivy Bridge generation or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce (VRAM 1GB or better)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Devices compartible Direct Sound
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720 or better required (Recommended 1920x1080)
